key_points.text:
Kotak Mahindra MF, Citigroup, others buy 10.64% stake in Home First Finance for Rs 1,307 crore
Posted 1h ago
AI Generated.
Citigroup Global Markets Mauritius, along with Kotak Mahindra MF and others, acquired a 10.64% stake in Home First Finance for ₹1,307 crore, expanding its investment footprint in India.

Citigroup Second Quarter 2025 Earnings: Beats Expectations
Positive Sentiment:
Citigroup raised its year-end S&P 500 target to 6,600 (up from 6,300), citing robust corporate earnings fueled by recent tax and spending legislation.

Positive Sentiment:
Citigroup’s second-quarter 2025 earnings beat both EPS and revenue expectations, reflecting stronger-than-anticipated performance across its segments.

Citigroup raises S&P 500 year-end target to 6,600
Neutral Sentiment:
